lookup.label: Allergies/Adverse Reactions
lookup.desc: An Allergies/Adverse Reactions record contains one VAAllergyIntolerance. This resource may contain Provenance resources documenting the origination, verification, and assessment, and, if applicable, circumstances under which it was judged to be in error. The originating Practitioner includes a title.

lookup.label: Appointment Button
lookup.desc: This use case addresses upcoming appointments with locations and prior appointments with associated documents.

lookup.label: Inpatient Orders - pending/non-verified
lookup.desc: Inpatient orders from CPRS that have not been verified by Pharmacy

lookup.label: Inpatient Orders IV/Clinic Infusions
lookup.desc: Verified inpatient or clinic IV orders

lookup.label: Inpatient Orders Unit Dose/Clinic Medications
lookup.desc: Verified inpatient or clinic unit dose orders

lookup.label: Lab - Chemistry, Hematology, Toxicology, Serology, Radioimmunoassay
VAAllergyIntolerance
lookup.desc: An AllergyIntolerance resource with extensions supporting VA processes.

lookup.desc: Provenance of the determination that the record is in error.

lookup.desc: Provenance of the AllergyIntolerance record.

lookup.label: VAAllergyIntoleranceVerification
lookup.desc: Provenance of the AllergyIntolerance verification.
